corporate_aboutUs.title: About Us
corporate_aboutUs.line0: At Next Yeminli Mali Müşavirlik (Next YMM), we were established in 2013 under the leadership of our founders, Metin Arslan and Soner Altıoğlu. Our company is dedicated to meeting the independent audit, tax consultancy, and financial solution needs of both domestic and international companies.
corporate_aboutUs.line1: Our team consists of experienced and qualified sworn financial advisors and auditors specialized in auditing, tax planning, and consultancy services. The sectors we serve include construction, textiles, information technology, healthcare, energy, metal-machinery, food, transportation, and plastics. By combining our sector knowledge with financial regulations, we aim to provide our clients with the highest quality service.
corporate_aboutUs.line2: At Next YMM, we evaluate and enhance our clients' financial structures with a professional approach. Our services include tax audits, tax disputes, VAT refunds, internal audits, and consultancy services designed to add value to our clients. Our service philosophy focuses on providing added value, minimizing tax and financial risks, and maximizing profitability through cost management.
corporate_aboutUs.line3: In our modern office, we provide accurate, fast, and reliable services to our clients with our expert team who closely follow current regulations and continuously develop through professional seminars and training. We use computer-assisted audit programs to achieve the most practical results in the shortest time. Additionally, we offer sector-specific financial law training and consultancy services to the staff working in our clients' accounting and finance departments.
corporate_aboutUs.line4: Our mission is to provide meticulous and transparent services with a commitment to ethical principles and a sense of responsibility, solving our clients' tax issues and helping them achieve their goals effectively. At Next YMM, we closely follow changes in financial legislation and provide our clients with up-to-date information and guidance in their financial planning.
corporate_aboutUs.line5: Next Yeminli Mali Müşavirlik stands by its clients with a professional service approach, working to facilitate their business processes and contribute to their success. Our expertise makes us an ideal partner for foreign companies looking to navigate and succeed in the Turkish market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Next Yeminli Mali Müşavirlik (Next YMM), our mission is to strengthen our clients' financial structures and optimize their business processes by providing the highest quality independent audit, tax consultancy, and financial solutions. Our team of experts adheres to ethical principles and acts with a sense of responsibility, aiming to minimize our clients' tax and financial risks, resolve tax audits and disputes, and add value through services such as VAT refunds and internal audits. We follow a continuous improvement and innovation approach, closely monitoring current regulations and transferring our sectoral knowledge to our clients to help them achieve their goals effectively.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision at Next YMM is to become a recognized and preferred financial consultancy firm in Turkey and internationally. Our goal is to facilitate our clients' business processes and contribute to their success by providing professional services. We effectively use technology to obtain accurate results quickly through computer-assisted audit programs and the most practical methods. Our sectoral training and consultancy services enhance the capabilities of our clients' accounting and finance departments and provide guidance in their financial planning. In the future, we will continue to adhere to our ethical values, strengthen our leadership in the sector, and strive to reach a broader client base.

tax.title: Tax Services
tax.description: Tax services include various tax planning, compliance, and refund processes to help organizations meet their tax obligations properly.

audit.title: Audit Services
audit.description: Audit services involve an independent review process to verify the accuracy of a company's financial statements and transactions.

advisory.title: Advisory Services
advisory.description: Advisory services provide expertise and support in various fields to guide companies in strategic decision-making processes.

other.title: Other Services
other.description: This category includes various support and expertise services that do not fit into the main categories above but still provide value to clients.

fullCertification.title: Full Certification
fullCertification.description: The Full Certification service involves a detailed examination and approval of a company's financial statements and other financial declarations for compliance with relevant legal and regulatory requirements. This service enhances the accuracy and reliability of financial reports, building trust for investors, creditors, and other stakeholders.
fullCertification.importance: Full Certification services are particularly important in sectors requiring high standards of transparency and accuracy in financial reporting. Through this service, companies can:
fullCertification.step1: Pre-Preparation: Gathering detailed information about the company's financial situation and previous period reports.
fullCertification.step2: Planning: Determining the scope and timing of the certification process.
fullCertification.step3: Implementation: Detailed examination of financial statements and related documents.
fullCertification.step4: Reporting: Reporting findings and results and providing necessary correction suggestions.
fullCertification.step5: Follow-Up: Monitoring the implementation of suggested corrections after reporting.
fullCertification.benefit1: Reliable Financial Information: Ensuring the accuracy of financial information, which is critical for investment decisions.
fullCertification.benefit2: Compliance: Full compliance with local and international financial reporting standards.
fullCertification.benefit3: Risk Management: Helping prevent financial errors and fraud.
fullCertification.recipients: Full Certification services are ideal for publicly traded companies, large SMEs, and companies considering investments. It is also important for any business applying for bank loans or other financial instruments.

vatRefund.title: VAT Refund and Offset Transactions
vatRefund.description: VAT Refund and Offset Transactions involve processes for returning or offsetting excess or incorrect VAT payments for VAT taxpayers. This service helps companies optimize cash flow and reduce financial burdens.
vatRefund.importance: VAT refund and offset transactions help companies eliminate unnecessary financial burdens and use their operating capital more effectively. These services provide significant financial relief, especially for exporting firms and businesses with high VAT payments.
vatRefund.step1: Situation Analysis: Detailed analysis of the company's VAT refund status.
vatRefund.step2: Document Collection and Organization: Collecting and organizing necessary documents for the refund or offset process.
vatRefund.step3: Application Preparation: Preparing refund or offset applications and submitting them to the relevant tax authorities.
vatRefund.step4: Follow-Up and Communication: Monitoring the application process and communicating with tax authorities as needed.
vatRefund.step5: Finalization: Finalizing and reporting the refund or offset transaction.
vatRefund.benefit1: Improved Cash Flow: Direct improvement of cash flow by refunding excess VAT paid.
vatRefund.benefit2: Cost Management: Reducing the VAT burden for better cost management.
vatRefund.benefit3: Tax Compliance: Increasing tax compliance by properly managing VAT-related legal processes.
vatRefund.recipients: VAT Refund and Offset Transactions are important for retailers, manufacturers, and other VAT taxpayers with high VAT payments, especially exporters. These processes should be regularly evaluated by all VAT taxpayers for more efficient use of financial resources.

taxConsultancy.title: Tax Consultancy
taxConsultancy.description: Tax Consultancy services involve optimizing tax obligations, tax planning, and managing compliance processes for both corporate and individual clients. These services provide strategic advice to minimize tax burdens while ensuring compliance with tax legislation.
taxConsultancy.importance: Tax consultancy helps companies and individuals make the right tax decisions within ever-changing tax laws and complex tax structures. This service is critical for managing tax costs, reducing potential tax risks, and maximizing legal tax advantages.
taxConsultancy.step1: Needs Analysis: In-depth analysis of the client's current tax situation and needs.
taxConsultancy.step2: Strategy Development: Developing tax strategies suitable for the client's financial goals.
taxConsultancy.step3: Implementation: Implementing developed tax strategies and making necessary adjustments.
taxConsultancy.step4: Reporting and Review: Evaluating the effectiveness of implemented strategies and preparing periodic reports.
taxConsultancy.step5: Continuous Support and Consultancy: Providing continuous support and adapting to changes in tax legislation.
taxConsultancy.benefit1: Tax Savings: Minimizing tax burdens through effective tax planning.
taxConsultancy.benefit2: Risk-Free Compliance: Full compliance with local and international tax laws.
taxConsultancy.benefit3: Decision Support: Considering tax factors in investment and business decisions.
taxConsultancy.benefit4: Financial Planning and Budgeting: More effective financial planning and budgeting.
taxConsultancy.recipients: Tax Consultancy services are especially valuable for large companies, SMEs, entrepreneurs, investors, and high-net-worth individuals with complex tax issues. These services provide the necessary expertise in tax planning and reporting processes, helping clients use their financial resources more efficiently.

otherCertification.title: Other Certification Processes
otherCertification.description: Other Certification Processes include the verification of documents and reports required for special purposes beyond standard financial reporting. This service covers certifications needed for special projects, grants, loans, or other financial transactions, helping organizations meet various financial and legal requirements.
otherCertification.importance: Special certification processes play a crucial role in providing financial verification needed for special situations and projects. These verifications are often required to prove financial credibility, ensure eligibility for grants or funds, or meet legal requirements for special financial transactions.
otherCertification.step1: Needs Analysis: Analyzing the specific situation and documents requiring certification.
otherCertification.step2: Document Preparation: Preparing the necessary documents and reports in detail.
otherCertification.step3: Certification Process: Applying the necessary procedures for document certification.
otherCertification.step4: Results Reporting: Reporting the results of certification processes and presenting them to relevant parties.
otherCertification.step5: Continuous Support: Providing continuous support and consultancy services after the completion of certification processes.
otherCertification.benefit1: Legal Compliance: Meeting various financial and legal requirements.
otherCertification.benefit2: Financial Reliability: Increasing the financial reliability of the organization.
otherCertification.benefit3: Project and Funding Opportunities: Ensuring eligibility for special projects and funding.
otherCertification.recipients: Other Certification Processes service is suitable for companies, NGOs, and public institutions that need verification for special projects, investment and financing needs, or grant and fund applications. This service is designed especially for situations requiring the approval of financial documents and reports for special purposes.

independentAudit.title: Independent Audit
independentAudit.description: Independent Audit is an objective evaluation of a company's financial statements and transactions for compliance with international and local financial reporting standards. This service increases the financial transparency of companies and provides trust to stakeholders, investors, and regulatory bodies.
independentAudit.importance: Independent audit not only ensures the accuracy and reliability of financial reports but also enhances a company's potential to attract investment and build a trustworthy market image. This service enables companies to maintain financial health and manage financial risks.
independentAudit.step1: Audit Planning: Developing a specific audit plan based on the company's financial structure and sectoral characteristics.
independentAudit.step2: Implementation: Detailed examination of financial statements and transaction records.
independentAudit.step3: Findings Analysis: Analyzing and evaluating obtained data.
independentAudit.step4: Reporting: Reporting audit results in compliance with standards and sharing them with relevant parties.
independentAudit.step5: Follow-Up and Evaluation: Monitoring post-audit processes and providing improvement suggestions if necessary.
independentAudit.benefit1: Transparency and Reliability: Increasing the transparency and reliability of company activities.
independentAudit.benefit2: Compliance and Management: Full compliance with local and international regulatory requirements.
independentAudit.benefit3: Risk Management: Effective management of financial risks and prevention of potential financial issues.
independentAudit.recipients: Independent Audit services are essential for publicly traded companies, large private companies, and all kinds of organizations. This service helps maintain the reliability of financial reports and protects the company's reputation in the market and among investors.

complianceAudit.title: Compliance Audit
complianceAudit.description: Compliance Audit involves systematically examining how well a company adheres to its internal policies and external legal regulations. This service is performed to ensure that companies operate in accordance with laws and internal regulations, helping to minimize potential compliance risks.
complianceAudit.importance: Compliance audit plays a critical role in preventing risks such as legal sanctions, penalties, and reputation loss. It also strengthens company management processes and increases stakeholder trust.
complianceAudit.step1: Policy and Legal Framework Review: Identifying the legal and internal policies the company must comply with.
complianceAudit.step2: Audit Planning: Planning the compliance audit process and allocating necessary resources.
complianceAudit.step3: Audit Implementation: Detailed examination of company transactions and documents.
complianceAudit.step4: Findings Reporting: Analyzing and reporting compliance audit results.
complianceAudit.step5: Recommendations and Improvement: Suggesting corrective measures for compliance issues and developing improvement plans.
complianceAudit.benefit1: Risk Management: Proactive management of legal and operational risks.
complianceAudit.benefit2: Transparency: Making business processes more transparent and enhancing management quality.
complianceAudit.benefit3: Trust and Reputation: Maintaining trust and reputation with investors, regulatory bodies, and other stakeholders.
complianceAudit.recipients: Compliance Audit services are essential for companies operating in sectors like financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and technology, where strict adherence to legal regulations is required. It is also important for any organization subject to high regulatory scrutiny.

fraudAudit.title: Fraud Audit
fraudAudit.description: Fraud Audit involves processes to prevent, detect, and address potential fraudulent and dishonest activities within a company. This service is performed to minimize financial losses, protect company assets, and ensure regulatory compliance.
fraudAudit.importance: Fraud audit provides protection against financial fraud, one of the biggest risks businesses may face. Through this service, companies can detect fraudulent transactions at an early stage and prevent the negative impacts of such activities.
fraudAudit.step1: Risk Assessment: Evaluating the company's fraud risks.
fraudAudit.step2: Audit Planning: Preparing a special audit plan focusing on potential fraud areas.
fraudAudit.step3: Implementation: Detailed examination of suspicious transactions and anomalies.
fraudAudit.step4: Findings and Reporting: Reporting detected fraud cases and risk areas.
fraudAudit.step5: Recommendations and Corrective Actions: Developing and implementing fraud prevention strategies.
fraudAudit.benefit1: Financial Security: Preventing financial losses and protecting company assets.
fraudAudit.benefit2: Reputation Management: Maintaining the company's reputation and ensuring a reliable business environment.
fraudAudit.benefit3: Compliance and Governance: Ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.
fraudAudit.recipients: Fraud Audit services are especially important for companies operating in sectors like banking, insurance, retail, and technology, where financial transactions are intense. It is also crucial for businesses of all sizes, particularly in areas with high financial fraud risk.

financialAdvisory.title: Financial Advisory
financialAdvisory.description: Financial Advisory services involve the management, optimization, and improvement of a company's accounting and financial transactions. This service is performed to enhance financial performance, reduce costs, and maximize profitability.
financialAdvisory.importance: Financial advisory is essential for maintaining and improving the financial health of companies. Effective financial management increases the resilience of businesses against market fluctuations and supports long-term sustainable growth.
financialAdvisory.step1: Financial Analysis: In-depth analysis of the company's current financial situation.
financialAdvisory.step2: Strategy Development: Developing strategies to reduce costs, increase revenues, and optimize asset utilization.
financialAdvisory.step3: Implementation: Integrating strategic plans into operational processes.
financialAdvisory.step4: Monitoring and Reporting: Continuously monitoring and reporting the performance of implemented strategies.
financialAdvisory.step5: Continuous Improvement: Providing strategic suggestions for continuous evaluation and improvement of performance.
financialAdvisory.benefit1: Profitability Increase: Maximizing revenues and effectively managing costs.
financialAdvisory.benefit2: Financial Transparency: Managing financial transactions in a transparent and understandable manner.
financialAdvisory.benefit3: Risk Management: Identifying and managing financial risks.
financialAdvisory.benefit4: Strategic Decision Support: Making strategic decisions based on financial data.
financialAdvisory.recipients: Financial Advisory services are suitable for small and medium-sized enterprises, large corporate firms, and startups in need of support in financial management and planning. Especially companies with complex financial structures or in the growth stage can benefit greatly from this service.

managementConsultancy.title: Management Consultancy
managementConsultancy.description: Management Consultancy services are professional services designed to strengthen corporate governance structures and optimize strategic planning processes for companies. These services aim to help businesses respond quickly and effectively to market changes, increase competitive advantages, and achieve long-term goals.
managementConsultancy.importance: Management consultancy helps companies cope with challenges in complex business and economic environments. Through this service, companies can make data-driven strategic decisions, strengthen their management structures, and increase operational efficiency.
managementConsultancy.step1: Situation Assessment: Evaluating the company's current management structure and strategic plans.
managementConsultancy.step2: Needs Analysis: Identifying management and strategy solutions suitable for the business's needs and goals.
managementConsultancy.step3: Solution Development: Developing customized management and strategic planning solutions.
managementConsultancy.step4: Implementation and Training: Implementing the developed solutions within the company and training relevant personnel.
managementConsultancy.step5: Evaluation and Improvement: Evaluating the effectiveness of implemented strategies and providing continuous improvement suggestions.
managementConsultancy.benefit1: Strategic Guidance: Guiding company strategies in line with market and technology trends.
managementConsultancy.benefit2: Operational Efficiency: Making business processes more efficient.
managementConsultancy.benefit3: Corporate Structuring: Raising the company's corporate governance standards.
managementConsultancy.benefit4: Risk Management: Effectively managing business and financial risks.
managementConsultancy.recipients: Management Consultancy services are ideal for medium and large-scale businesses experiencing growth and transformation processes and looking to update their management structures and strategic plans. Startups and small businesses can also benefit greatly from this service for strategic guidance and structuring.

corporateFinance.title: Corporate Finance
corporateFinance.description: Corporate Finance services provide financial consultancy and support for strategic transactions such as mergers, acquisitions, and financial restructuring. These services help businesses effectively manage their growth and expansion strategies and facilitate complex financial transactions.
corporateFinance.importance: Corporate finance plays a critical role in businesses' efforts to enhance competitive advantages and strengthen market positions. Financial restructuring, mergers, and acquisitions enable companies to expand their operational and financial capacities.
corporateFinance.step1: Strategy Development: Identifying appropriate corporate finance strategies based on the company's goals and market conditions.
corporateFinance.step2: Opportunity Analysis: Evaluating potential merger or acquisition opportunities.
corporateFinance.step3: Structuring and Negotiation: Structuring the transaction and conducting pricing negotiations.
corporateFinance.step4: Restructuring and Implementation: Preparing and implementing financial restructuring and post-transaction integration plans.
corporateFinance.step5: Evaluation and Reporting: Evaluating and reporting the outcomes of the transaction.
corporateFinance.benefit1: Growth and Expansion: Growth and market expansion through strategic transactions.
corporateFinance.benefit2: Financial Efficiency: Optimizing financial structures and reducing costs.
corporateFinance.benefit3: Risk Management: Effective management and minimization of financial risks.
corporateFinance.benefit4: Market Positioning: Achieving a stronger market position.
corporateFinance.recipients: Corporate Finance services are suitable for medium and large-scale businesses aiming to grow, increase market share, and create operational synergy. It is also important for companies looking to evaluate consolidation opportunities in their industries.

internalAudit.title: Internal Audit
internalAudit.description: Internal Audit Services involve systematically evaluating and analyzing a company's internal procedures and controls. This service is performed to enhance the effectiveness of internal control systems, strengthen operational efficiency, and improve management processes.
internalAudit.importance: Internal audit makes company management processes more transparent and accountable. It also reduces operational risks and supports strategic decision-making mechanisms. This service helps identify potential weaknesses and non-compliance in business processes.
internalAudit.step1: Audit Planning: Determining the scope and objectives of the internal audit.
internalAudit.step2: Risk Assessment: Evaluating internal operational and financial risks.
internalAudit.step3: Implementation: Detailed examination of internal control systems and procedures.
internalAudit.step4: Findings and Reporting: Preparing comprehensive reports on identified issues and risks.
internalAudit.step5: Recommendations and Improvement: Developing suggestions for improving internal control and management processes.
internalAudit.benefit1: Operational Efficiency: Managing business processes more efficiently and effectively.
internalAudit.benefit2: Risk Management: Early identification and management of potential risks.
internalAudit.benefit3: Management and Control: Strengthening management processes with strong internal control mechanisms.
internalAudit.benefit4: Compliance and Regulatory Needs: Full compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.
internalAudit.recipients: Internal Audit Services are important for large-scale companies with complex operational and financial processes. This service is also essential for any organization, especially those operating in sectors with regulatory audits and legal compliance requirements.

trainingServices.title: Training Services
trainingServices.description: Training Services offer professional and practical training programs in accounting, tax, and other financial subjects. These services are designed to enhance the financial knowledge and skills of company employees and individual participants, ensure compliance with current regulations, and increase professional competencies.
trainingServices.importance: Training services help companies and professionals remain competitive in the face of rapidly changing financial regulations and business requirements. Continuous learning and development help manage business processes and decision-making mechanisms more effectively.
trainingServices.step1: Needs Analysis: Determining the training needs of participants and designing suitable training programs.
trainingServices.step2: Development of Corporate Training Modules: Preparing customized training content tailored to the company's specific needs.
trainingServices.step3: Training Implementation: Conducting interactive and practical training sessions.
trainingServices.step4: Evaluation and Feedback: Evaluating training results and gathering feedback from participants.
trainingServices.step5: Continuous Development and Support: Providing post-training support and offering advanced training opportunities.
trainingServices.benefit1: Skills Enhancement: Providing in-depth knowledge and practical skills in financial subjects.
trainingServices.benefit2: Support for Legal Compliance: Raising awareness and education on compliance with current regulations.
trainingServices.benefit3: Improved Decision-Making: Enhancing conscious and effective decision-making skills through training.
trainingServices.benefit4: Career Development: Offering opportunities for professional career advancement and expertise.
trainingServices.recipients: Training Services are suitable for company employees, accounting and finance professionals, managers, and individual participants looking to enhance their knowledge and skills in financial subjects. These services are especially valuable for individuals and organizations seeking continuous development and professional competence.

amlConsultancy.title: Anti-Money Laundering and Financial Crime Legislation Consultancy
amlConsultancy.description: Anti-Money Laundering and Financial Crime Legislation Consultancy services provide strategic consultancy to help companies combat financial crimes and comply with related legal regulations. These services include identifying, preventing, and managing risks related to money laundering, misuse of financing, and other financial crimes.
amlConsultancy.importance: This consultancy service is essential for preventing the financial system from being abused and protecting companies against the risks of financial crimes. It also strengthens regulatory compliance and helps protect the company's reputation.
amlConsultancy.step1: Risk Assessment: Evaluating the company's existing defenses against financial crimes.
amlConsultancy.step2: Policy and Procedure Development: Developing effective anti-money laundering and financial crime prevention policies and procedures.
amlConsultancy.step3: Training and Awareness: Providing training on combating financial crimes to company employees.
amlConsultancy.step4: Monitoring and Reporting: Regularly monitoring and reporting implemented policies and procedures.
amlConsultancy.step5: Continuous Update and Consultancy: Providing consultancy to adapt to regulatory changes and keep the company's financial crime combat strategies up-to-date.
amlConsultancy.benefit1: Regulatory Compliance: Full compliance with local and international anti-financial crime regulations.
amlConsultancy.benefit2: Risk Management: Effective management and reduction of financial crime risks.
amlConsultancy.benefit3: Reputation Protection: Protecting the company's reputation from the negative impacts associated with financial crimes.
amlConsultancy.benefit4: Secure Business Environment: Promoting a secure and transparent business environment.
amlConsultancy.recipients: Anti-Money Laundering and Financial Crime Legislation Consultancy services are suitable for companies operating in high financial crime risk sectors, especially the financial services sector. It is also important for organizations with international business structures and subject to regulatory audits.
